### Definisiónir

Í einum rættvinklaðum trýkanti við vinkul $\theta$:

**Sinus:**
$$
\sin(\theta) = \frac{\text{Mótstøðu katetur}}{\text{Hypotenusa}} = \frac{a}{c}
$$

**Cosinus:**
$$
\cos(\theta) = \frac{\text{Løggjandi katetur}}{\text{Hypotenusa}} = \frac{b}{c}
$$

**Tangens:**
$$
\tan(\theta) = \frac{\text{Mótstøðu katetur}}{\text{Løggjandi katetur}} = \frac{a}{b}
$$

### Minnireglur

**SOH-CAH-TOA:**
- **S**in = **O**pposite/**H**ypotenuse
- **C**os = **A**djacent/**H**ypotenuse
- **T**an = **O**pposite/**A**djacent

### Serlig virði

| Vinkul | sin | cos | tan |
|--------|-----|-----|-----|
| 0°     | 0   | 1   | 0   |
| 30°    | 1/2 | √3/2| √3/3|
| 45°    | √2/2| √2/2| 1   |
| 60°    | √3/2| 1/2 | √3  |
| 90°    | 1   | 0   | ∞   |

### Pythagoreiskt samband

$$
\sin^2(\theta) + \cos^2(\theta) = 1
$$
